content.description: Start sitting with right hand in small incut edge on face, left hand crimp on arete. A few fun compression moves will get you to the top.
content.location: 50 ft uphill from the Bachelor Boulder.

climbs.name: Pocket Protector
climbs.fa: Ian CB and Eric Cashman maybe

content.description: A sweet little problem, start sitting on the left side of the clean arete, left hand out on the face with an undercling and right hand on the arete at the second bump feature (probably the best feeling spot).  Pull on, gain a better hold on the arete and finagle your way to the top.
content.location: On the boulder just west and next to Purple Sharpie on the uphill side.

content.description: Start on obvious rail, possibly with a gaston spot for the left hand.  Gain an undercling in the face and pull through to better holds above.  An elegant little problem.
content.location: Below Brintons crack in talus.  Just uphill and west of the boulders Purple Sharpie and Slab of Doom.

climbs.name: Highliter
climbs.fa: Ben Summay and Ian CB maybe?

content.description: Start in the pit, matched on an obvious edge.  A big move to the lip and a few more moves will get you outta there.
content.protection: A small pad and a slider
content.location: Just below and facing Purple Sharpie.

content.description: From the start of Purple Sharpie (sit, left hand on edge by left arete, right hand in the face on an incut side pull), move left, rock onto the slab, and finish up the slab via the face and arete.  Surprisingly fun, we thought.
content.location: Just above slab of doom.  200 feet west of CCC trail, halfway up steep stair section to the flatiron.

content.description: Sunny, in the middle of the boulder field.
